column4: Can I plug guitar into mic or line-in and use Sound Recorder to make crude recording?
it won't sound good, need an amp really
How does Garage Band do it un-amped?
you can do the same here, fiddle with levels etc, but you will never be very happy with it
probably go into line-in and put full vol or near on that port
What Sound Capture driver should I use?
I guess you are right.  You can't record a guitar
not satisfactorily without a good input
Upon playback I hear hiss and sound of strings almost in background
could try the mic input, watch levels
You ever try a pocket recorder?
